duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain all current project drawings, specifications, and addenda and distribution to subcontractors
Generate detailed estimates for prospective clients as required
Develop project scopes for each division of work during the preconstruction timeline
Assist the Preconstruction Manager in managing deliverable timelines
Coordinate subcontractor estimating meetings with prospective clients/design team
Study plans and provide estimating guidelines to subcontractors and vendors
Quantity takeoffs using detailed spreadsheets and takeoff software
Maintenance of current approved Subcontractor/Vendor List
Support project download meetings with project manager and superintendent
Update Residential and Commercial Department heads on current estimate statuses during weekly meeting
Attendance at networking and social events
Be an ambassador for the RKA Brand

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Civil Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
